document_data.name: Phindal
document_data.mainbody: '''Phindal''' was an apothecary of [[Gildenglade]] in [[Turmish]] noted for inventing the [[sleep-needle trap]]s that were in common use for household security across Turmish by the 1360s DR.{{Cite polyhedron/101/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: Turmish Customers and Festivals|23}}
